Ho Chi Minh City Department of Transport has worked with

people's travel needs. Accordingly, the new Mien Dong bus station

new Mien Dong bus station route to Da Lat to meet

Western bus station and its operators also

7,000 bus trips to and from the interprovincial bus station

4 to 15 minutes per trip.
Working with Samco Corporation to arrange 40
free passenger shuttle buses, the
travel needs of people from

vice versa are not peak times.

new Ho Chi Minh City police
issue a warning about crime. Online fraud
through image creation applications is being
used by many people on social networks. This
poses many risks of abetting
fraud criminals, such as the use of
Taoist applications.  Animated photos will reveal
personal information accompanying the image such as the
device, time, and location where the photo was taken. When the
user downloads applications and grants
access to the device through the application, there is a
high risk of personal information being leaked.
collected by people with bad intentions, the
city police advise that before
installing any application on an
electronic device, users need to consider the
permissions that the application requires for
limited access and image sharing.  Information about
personal data on social networking platforms
that absolutely do not provide
private sensitive photos to the application is
